pageContext.claim: “Paul Manafort worked for Ronald Reagan, Bob Dole and many other highly prominent and respected political leaders. He worked for me for a very short time. Why didn’t government tell me that he was under investigation. These old charges have nothing to do with Collusion - a Hoax!”
pageContext.analysis: Manafort worked on Trump's presidential campaign for 144 days in 2016, 92 of them as its chairman. He was an instrumental figure.
